productDescriptions.PCC: Premium Portland Composite Cement for various construction applications. Contains selected materials providing optimal strength and superior durability.
productDescriptions.OPC: Ordinary Portland Cement with SNI standards for structural construction. Provides high compressive strength and longevity for high-rise buildings.
productDescriptions.SRC: Sulfate Resistant Cement specifically for corrosive areas. Ideal for coastal, industrial projects, and high-sulfate environments.
productDescriptions.SRPC: Portland Pozzolan Cement with natural pozzolan content providing additional strength and superior chemical resistance. Suitable for concrete structures requiring high durability.
